title: Acadia National Park: Blind / Low Vision
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility     Blind / Low Vision              Blind / Low Vision          Park Orientation Video Enjoy a 15-minute narrative of the park at the Hulls Cove Visitor Center. Audio description is available for check out audio receivers at the information desk.        Audio Tour CDs of the 56-mile (90 km) audio tour of Park Loop Road, Cadillac Summit, and Somes Sound may be purchased at Hulls Cove Visitor Center.      Braille Brochure A Braille introductory pamphlet available by request at the Hulls Cove Visitor Center, or for download in a Braille Ready Format. Acadia Braille Brochure .BRF file
